data_table.description: Personal History Form, Exam 3. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: PHXA2
variable.description: [Medical care]. Have you seen a physician's assistant or a nurse practitioner for any reason in the last 12 months? Q2 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA3
variable.description: [Medical care]. How often do you have a routine physical examination, that is, not for a particular illness, but for a general check up? Q3 [Personal History Form, exam 3]
variable.value: At least once every five years
Less than once every five years
Do not have routine physical examinations

variable.name: PHXA4
variable.description: [Medical care]. Do you have health insurance, Medicaid, Medicare, or a medical plan, such as an HMO, which pays part of a hospital, doctor's, or surgeon's bill? Q4 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA5A
variable.description: [Medical care]. Prepaid insurance or health plan, such as BC/BS or HMO. Q5a [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA5B
variable.description: [Medical care]. Medicare. Q5b [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA5C
variable.description: [Medical care]. Medicaid. Q5c [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA5D
variable.description: [Medical care]. Other. Q5d [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA6
variable.description: [Medical care]. When you want help with a health problem, where do you usually go? By a health problem I mean an illness, a question or concern, or a need for a test or treatment. Q6 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA7
variable.description: [Medical care]. Have you ever seen a heart specialist? Q7 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA8A
variable.description: [Medical care]. Has a doctor ever said you had high blood pressure or hypertension (high blood). Q8a [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA8B
variable.description: [Medical care]. Has there ever been a time when you didn't get treatment for your high blood pressure when you needed it? Q8b [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA8C
variable.description: [Medical care]. What was the main reason you were unable to get blood pressure treatment? Q8c [Personal History Form, exam 3]
variable.value: Could not pay for it and didn't have enough insurance
Didn't have a doctor or clinic to get medical care
Wasn't able to get to the doctor or drug store
Didn't have time or had more important things to take care of

variable.name: PHXA8E
variable.description: [Medical care]. Has a doctor ever said you had high blood cholesterol? Q8e [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA8F
variable.description: [Medical care]. Has there ever been a time when you didn't get treatment for your high blood cholesterol when you needed it? Q8f [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA8G
variable.description: [Medical care]. What was the main reason you were unable to get treatment for your high blood cholesterol when you needed it? Q8g [Personal History Form, exam 3]
variable.value: Could not pay for it and didn't have enough insurance
Didn't have a doctor or clinic to get medical care
Wasn't able to get to the doctor or drug store
Didn't have time or had more important things to take care of

variable.name: PHXA8I
variable.description: [Medical care]. Heart attack? Q8i [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA8J
variable.description: [Medical care]. Heart failure or congestive heart failure? Q8j [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA8K
variable.description: [Medical care]. Diabetes (sugar in the blood)? Q8k [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA8L
variable.description: [Medical care]. Chronic lung disease, such as bronchitis, or emphysema? Q8l [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA8M
variable.description: [Medical care]. Asthma? Q8m [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA8N
variable.description: [Medical care]. Do you still have it? Q8n [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA8O
variable.description: [Medical care]. Cancer? Q8o [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA8P
variable.description: [Medical care]. Can you tell me in what part of the body the cancer was located? Q8p [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA8R
variable.description: [Medical care]. Have you had another cancer? Q8r [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA8S
variable.description: [Medical care]. Can you tell me in what part of the body the cancer was located? Q8s [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA9
variable.description: [Congestive heart failure]. Since your last ARIC visit, have you had to sleep on 2 or more pillows to help you breathe? Q9 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA10
variable.description: [Congestive heart failure]. Since your last ARIC visit, have you been awakened at night by trouble breathing? Q10 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA11
variable.description: [Congestive heart failure]. Since your last ARIC visit, have you had swelling of your feet or ankles (excluding during pregnancy)? Q11 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA12
variable.description: [Congestive heart failure]. Did it tend to come on during the day and go down overnight? Q12 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA13
variable.description: [Migraine headaches]. Have you had headaches lasting more than 4 hours? Q13 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA14
variable.description: [Migraine headaches]. Was the pain mostly on one side of your head? Q14 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA15
variable.description: [Migraine headaches]. Did your headache throb, pulsate or pound? Q15 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA16
variable.description: [Migraine headaches]. Was your headache accompanied by nausea and/or vomiting? Q16 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA17
variable.description: [Migraine headaches]. During your headache, did lights bother you or make the headache worse? Q17 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA18
variable.description: [Migraine headaches]. During your headache, did sounds bother you or make the headache worse? Q18 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA19
variable.description: [Migraine headaches]. When you got your headache, did you feel like going into a dark room and lying down? Q19 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA22
variable.description: [Migraine headaches]. Did you ever notice spots, jagged lines or heat waves in one or both eyes before you got the headache? Q22 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA23
variable.description: [Migraine headaches]. Have you ever been told by a physician that you have migraine headaches? Q23 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA24
variable.description: [Migraine headaches]. Did either of your parents suffer from migraine headaches? Q24 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA25
variable.description: [Smoking]. Have you ever smoked cigarettes? Q25 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA26
variable.description: [Smoking]. Did a doctor or other health professional ever advise you to stop smoking? Q26 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA27
variable.description: [Smoking]. Do you now smoke cigarettes? Q27 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA28
variable.description: [Smoking]. When did you smoke your last cigarette? Q28 [Personal History Form, exam 3]
variable.value: At least 2 months, but less than 12 months
At least 12 months, but less than 24 months
At least 24 months, but less than 36 months

variable.name: PHXA31
variable.description: [Smoking]. Do (did) you inhale the cigarette smoke? Q31 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA32A
variable.description: [Smoking]. Please tell me if you are currently using or have ever used a pipe, cigars, cigarillos, chewing tobacco, snuff, or nicotine gum or patch prescribed by a doctor; for example, Nicorette, Nicoderm, Habitrol? Pipe/cigars/cigarillos. Q32a [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA32B
variable.description: [Smoking]. Please tell me if you are currently using or have ever used a pipe, cigars, cigarillos, chewing tobacco, snuff, or nicotine gum or patch prescribed by a doctor; for example, Nicorette, Nicoderm, Habitrol? Chewing tobacco. Q32b [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA32C
variable.description: [Smoking]. Please tell me if you are currently using or have ever used a pipe, cigars, cigarillos, chewing tobacco, snuff, or nicotine gum or patch prescribed by a doctor; for example, Nicorette, Nicoderm, Habitrol? Snuff. Q32c [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA32D
variable.description: [Smoking]. Please tell me if you are currently using or have ever used a pipe, cigars, cigarillos, chewing tobacco, snuff, or nicotine gum or patch prescribed by a doctor; for example, Nicorette, Nicoderm, Habitrol? Nicotine gum or patch. Q32d [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA34
variable.description: [Passive smoking]. Does anyone living with you now smoke cigarettes? Q34 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA35
variable.description: [Passive smoking]. Have you ever lived for at least one year with someone (including a parent or spouse) who smoked cigarettes regularly in your home? Q35 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA37
variable.description: [Passive smoking]. Does anyone working with you now smoke cigarettes regularly in your work area? Q37 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA38
variable.description: [Passive smoking]. Have you ever worked for at least one year with someone who smoked cigarettes regularly in your work area? Q38 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA40
variable.description: [Alcohol]. Do you presently drink alcoholic beverages? Q40 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA41
variable.description: [Alcohol]. Have you ever consumed alcoholic beverages? Q41 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA52
variable.description: [Alcohol]. Was there ever a time in your life when you consumed 5 or more drinks of any kind of alcoholic beverage almost every day? Q52 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA53
variable.description: [Occupation]. Since your last ARIC visit, have you changed your occupation, stopped working, or retired? Q53 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA54
variable.description: [Occupation]. I would like you to look at this card while I read it to you. Please tell me the letter of the one which best describes your CURRENT occupation. Q54 [Personal History Form, exam 3]
variable.value: Homemaking, not working outside the home
Employed at a job for pay, either full or part-time
Employed, but temporarily away from my regular work
Retired from my usual occupation and not working
Retired from my usual occupation but working for pay

variable.name: PHXA55
variable.description: [Occupation]. Did you retire because of health reasons? Q55 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA56
variable.description: [Occupation]. Are (were) you self employed for this occupation? Q56 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA57
variable.description: [Occupation]. Since your last ARIC visit, have (did) you change(d) the company for which you work(ed)? Q57 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA59
variable.description: [Occupation]. Occupation code from worksheet. Q59 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA60
variable.description: [Occupation]. Please look at this card. Which of these income groups represents your total combined family income for the past 12 months? Include income from all sources such as wages, salaries, social security or retirement benefits, help from relatives, rent from property, and so forth. Please tell me the letter only. Q60 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA61
variable.description: [Occupation]. On average, how many people lived in your house for the last 12 months? Q61 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA62
variable.description: [Occupation]. Are you currently caring for a sick or disabled relative? Q62 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXAFLAG
variable.description: 1= PHXA form is present [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXACY
variable.description: Contact year [7] [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA1A
variable.description: [Medical care]. How long has it been since you last saw a doctor for any reason? Years. Q1a [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA20
variable.description: [Migraine headaches]. How many years have you had headaches like this? Q20 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA21
variable.description: [Migraine headaches]. How many headaches like this have you had in the past year? Q21 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA30
variable.description: [Smoking]. How many cigarettes do you smoke per day now? Q30 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA44A
variable.description: [Alcohol]. How many glasses of wine do you usually have per week? (4 oz. glasses; round down). Q44a [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA44B
variable.description: [Alcohol]. How many days in a week do you usually drink wine? Q44b [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA45A
variable.description: [Alcohol]. How many glasses, bottles, or cans of beer do you usually have per week? (12 oz. glasses, bottles, or cans, round down). Q45a [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA45B
variable.description: [Alcohol]. How many days in a week do you usually drink beer? Q45b [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA46A
variable.description: [Alcohol]. How many drinks of hard liquor do you usually have per week? (1.5 oz. shots; round down). Q46a [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA46B
variable.description: [Alcohol]. How many days in a week do you usually drink hard liquor? Q46b [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA1B
variable.description: [Medical care]. How long has it been since you last saw a doctor for any reason? Months. Q1b [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA29
variable.description: [Smoking]. Prior to quitting, how many cigarettes did you usually smoke per day? Q29 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA36
variable.description: [Passive smoking]. For how many years in total have you lived with someone who smoked cigarettes regularly in your home? Q36 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA39
variable.description: [Passive smoking]. For how many years in total have you worked with someone who smoked cigarettes regularly in your work area? Q39 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA42
variable.description: [Alcohol]. Approximately how many years ago did you stop drinking? Q42 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA43
variable.description: [Alcohol]. For how many years did you consume alcoholic beverages? Q43 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA47
variable.description: [Alcohol]. During the past 24 hours, how many drinks have you had? Q47 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA48
variable.description: [Alcohol]. For how many years have you consumed alcoholic beverages? Q48 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA49
variable.description: [Alcohol]. Thinking about the entire time you consumed alcoholic beverages, how many glasses of wine did you usually have per week? (4 oz. glasses; round down). Q49 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA50
variable.description: [Alcohol]. Thinking about the entire time you consumed alcoholic beverages, how many glasses, cans, or bottles of beer did you usually have per week? (12 oz. glasses, bottles or cans; round down). Q50 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA51
variable.description: [Alcohol]. Thinking about the entire time you consumed alcoholic beverages, how many drinks of hard liquor did you usually have per week (1.5 oz. shot, round down). Q51 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA33
variable.description: [Passive smoking]. During the past year, about how many hours per week, on the average, were you in close contact with people when they were smoking? For example, in your home, in a car, at work or other close quarters. Q33 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA8DMONTHS
variable.description: Months of when last see doctor about high BP since exam 1 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA8HMONTHS
variable.description: Months of when last see doctor about cholesterol since exam 1 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA8QMONTHS
variable.description: Months of when cancer diagnosed since exam 1 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: PHXA8TMONTHS
variable.description: Months of when cancer diagnosed since exam 1 [Personal History Form, exam 3]

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC participant ID [Personal History Form, exam 3]
